Package org.swat.data

Interface Summary
IGameInfo The interface that is implemented by the GameInfo objects.
 

Class Summary
Coordinate Stores an x and y coordinate
DataParsing Provides methods for serializing data objects into Strings as well are reading them back
GameInfo The data object that provides information about a game
GameMove The data object that describes a game move
GameState The data object that describes the current state of a game
LineReader Provides a stateful line-by-line reader.
 

Enum Summary
GAME_STATE The enumeration containing the different states a game can be in.
GAME_TYPE The enumeration detailing the type of moves that can be made in a game move - the pieces can be moved only add - new pieces can be added only move_add - both of the above types of moves can be made
MESSAGE The enumeration containing the list of error messages sent to the clients ILLEGAL_GAME_STATE - sent when a request is made to operate on a game state that is stale, invalid etc.
